events.message: Candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, emphasizing his extensive experience with scalable backend systems and cloud infrastructure.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster due to keywords mentioning software development, backend expertise, and cloud technologies.
Recruiter Sarah was assigned to manage the candidate's process and will coordinate the upcoming screening and interview phases for the software engineering role.
Conducted the initial phone screening with John, who demonstrated a strong understanding of software development principles and relevant engineering tools.
John responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, confirming his availability for a technical interview next week.
Scheduled a technical interview for John with the engineering team on May 7th, focusing on backend systems, coding skills, and DevOps experience.
